response.overview: With exclusive access to training sessions, key matches, and personal moments, the young female soccer players of the Club Tijuana Xolos U-19 women's team reveal their deepest emotions: the pride of representing their team, the yearning to reach the first division in professional soccer, and the desire to become an example for girls who dream of playing soccer.
response.title: Perrísimas: El Legado del Futbol
